fields.label: Service Page Content Guide
fields.message: To add content, click "New Content" and select "Section" or "Block". They should be in the following order, and relate to the content here: 1. Section Menu title: Formats Containing the following blocks: Fixed Image > Yes > Picture of messy photos List > Related Items (select related formats) Text > Fun description of differing types of formats and the history they might have. Then a sentence about how DiJiFi can handle all of them! 2. Divider Testimonial > Highlighted 3. Section Menu title: Results Fixed Image > Yes > Picture of folder of photos on a computer or other device Text > Description of organized photos and options for results of transfer List > Icon list of file types 4. Divider Inline > Prompt to call 5. Section Menu title > Process Text > Empathetic description about the care taken in handling media, and mention the rare-ity and quality of equipment and process. Related Page > Link to process page, have a sentence appealing to people interested in the tech, and that you guys are nerds yourselves! (no offense)
